typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ContactId as string,
		{Full Name} as string,
		{First Name} as string,
		{Last Name} as string,
		{Middle Name} as string,
		{SSN/SIN} as string,
		{Home Phone} as string,
		{Primary Phone} as string,
		{Mobile Phone} as string,
		{E-mail} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Date of Birth} as string,
		{Marital Status} as string,
		{Home : Street 1} as string,
		{Home : Street 2} as string,
		{Home City} as string,
		{Home State/Province} as string,
		{Home : ZIP/Postal Code} as string,
		{Home Country/Region} as string,
		Member as string,
		Producer as string,
		Branch as string,
		HouseHold as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	wildcardPaths:['*.csv']) ~> SourceCSVFile
SourceCSVFile derive(Gender = iif(Gender=="M","1",iif(Gender=="F","2","1")),
		{Marital Status} = iif({Marital Status}=="Single","1",iif({Marital Status}=="Married","2",iif({Marital Status}=="Divorced","3","2"))),
		Status = iif({Status}=="Inactive","1","0"),
		Member = iif(Member=="Yes","1",iif(Member=="No","0","0")),
		Producer = iif(Producer=="Yes","1",iif(Producer=="No","0","0"))) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 sink(input(
		ContactId as string,
		{Full Name} as string,
		{First Name} as string,
		{Last Name} as string,
		{Middle Name} as string,
		{SSN/SIN} as string,
		{Home Phone} as string,
		{Primary Phone} as string,
		{Mobile Phone} as string,
		{E-mail} as string,
		Gender as string,
		{Date of Birth} as string,
		{Marital Status} as string,
		{Home : Street 1} as string,
		{Home : Street 2} as string,
		{Home City} as string,
		{Home State/Province} as string,
		{Home : ZIP/Postal Code} as string,
		{Home Country/Region} as string,
		Member as string,
		Producer as string,
		Branch as string,
		HouseHold as string,
		Status as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	filePattern:'Foresters_Contacts*.csv',
	truncate: true,
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> TransformedCSVFile
